name: Sigurd Scythe
loreDescription: As the moonlight revealed a figure holding a scythe, the astonished onlookers exclaimed, "the God of Death has descended!"

skillDescription.base: When the caster's Health is less than 50%, increases Attack by 25% and absorbs 25.0% of the damage dealt as Health.
skillDescription.max: When the caster's Health is less than 50%, increases Attack by 25% and absorbs 50.0% of the damage dealt as Health.
